@graph.name: AnnData to Seurat conversion
@graph.description:
AnnData to Seurat format conversion (manually using Galaxy buttons)

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Converting between common single cell data formats](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-data-ingest/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
